clinical_history: Patient with neurological deficits referred for brain PET-CT.
findings: Physiologic brown fat uptake in supraclavicular region.
Hypermetabolic lymph nodes noted in left lung lower lobe, suggestive of malignancy.
No abnormal FDG uptake in the remaining organs.
Diffuse mild increased uptake in liver, likely benign.
Focal hypermetabolic activity noted in left lung lower lobe with SUVmax 9.55.
Physiologic uptake observed in brain, myocardium, and urinary tract.
recommendations: Correlate with MRI/CT for precise anatomical localization.
